summary: Increases Nightingale Bow damge when tempered.
descriptionHtml:
Increases Nightingale Bow damge when tempered to match a tempered Daedric Bow. 

To increase Nightingale Bow damge to the max you must have the ebony smithing perk.

Main versions default enchantment is removed & can have custom enchantments.

Second version keeps the default enchantment.

-Added Glass version by request, the Nightingale Bow is tempered with Refined Malachite & the glass smithing perk is required to achieve maximum damage. File contains both default & custom enchantment versions, pick one .esp, NOT BOTH & drop into Data folder. Does not require main version to work!    ENJOY!

-NOTE-
To match the Daedric bow Damage you must obtain the best version of the bow which is at level 46 & higher. I recommend this mod to obtain the best version:

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2604

-UPDATES-
* Fixed missing default enchantment description for ebony & glass versions.
* Fixed default enhantment versions both ebony & glass versions
author: Savage Hammer

files.name: Nightingale Bow Damge Increase Glass Version
